title: Hugh Evans (basketball)
summary: Hubert "Hugh" Evans (November 8, 1940 – July 8, 2022) was an American basketball referee in the National Basketball Association (NBA) for 28 seasons.  He worked 1,969 regular season NBA games and 35 NBA Finals games during his NBA officiating career from 1972 to 2001.  He subsequently served as an assistant supervisor of officials in the NBA front office.
